text: Hi <@U018FJJB2PL> what do you mean by “dnd_module value”? What is the context of retrieving it?

Hi <@UMVR6LVLK>
This spring, inside our family studio, we’ve created a HubSpot app to help with speed optimization.

It scans the page for links and prefetches any pages to be viewed next.
It’s a free solution, give it a try. It might help you keep visitors longer on a website
<https://linkfetcher.kohorta.co/>
<@UMVR6LVLK> my partner specializes on speed optimization and very fond of this area. If you are interested DM a page so we could look into it

Hey Guys
I have created the custom module for header section. I am using the below mentioned code to upload logo dynamically through the template:
{% logo
                override_inherited_src="{{ module.logo_field.override_inherited_src }}"
                src="{{ module.logo_field.src }}"
                alt="{{ module.logo_field.alt }}"
                width='130'
                suppress_company_name="{{ module.logo_field.suppress_company_name }}"
              %}

But, I want to add the link to logo so that we can changes the logo link as per requirement through the template and reuse it.
Kindly help me how i can do this
